languages.text: В глазах Саргоны вы уже не просто враг, а заклеймленн{mf|ый|ая} варпом — сам злой рок, что пришел по его душу.
In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — a manifestation of certain doom.
languages.original_text: В глазах Саргоны вы уже не просто враг, а заклеймленн{mf|ый|ая} варпом — сам злой рок, что пришел по его душу.

traits.locale_text: In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — the same evil doom that came upon his soul.
In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — the same evil doom that came upon his soul.
In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — the same evil doom that came upon his soul.
In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — a manifestation of certain doom.
In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — a manifestation of certain doom.

languages.text: サルゴナの目には、あなたはもはや単なる敵ではなく、〈歪み〉に刻印を押された者、避けられない滅びを体現する存在として映っているのだ。
languages.original_text: In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — a manifestation of certain doom.

traits.locale_text: サルゴナの目には、あなたはもはや単なる敵ではなく、〈歪み〉に刻印を押された者、避けられない滅びを体現する存在として映っているのだ。
サルゴナの目には、あなたはもはや単なる敵ではなく、〈歪み〉に刻印を押された者、彼の魂に降りかかったのと同じ邪悪な運命に印された者として映っているのだ。

languages.text: In Sargonas Augen bist du nicht länger nur {mf|ein Feind|eine Feindin}, sondern jemand, der vom Warp gezeichnet wurde – eine Manifestation des sicheren Untergangs.
languages.original_text: In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — a manifestation of certain doom.

traits.locale_text: In Sargonas Augen bist du nicht länger nur {mf|ein Feind|eine Feindin}, sondern jemand, der vom Warp gezeichnet wurde – eine Manifestation des sicheren Untergangs.

languages.text: Sargona'nın nazarında artık sıradan bir düşman değil, kıyametin tezahürü olan öteboyut lanetinin mührüyle damgalanmış bir muharipsin.
languages.original_text: In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — a manifestation of certain doom.

traits.locale_text: Sargona'nın nazarında artık sıradan bir düşman değil, kıyametin tezahürü olan öteboyut lanetinin mührüyle damgalanmış bir muharipsin.
Sargona'nın nazarında artık sıradan bir düşman değil, onun ruhuna da çökmüş olan öteboyut lanetinin mührüyle damgalanmış bir muharipsin.

languages.text: A ojos de Sargona, ya no eres solo un{mf||a} enemig{mf|o|a}, sino un{mf|o|a} marcad{mf|o|a} por la disformidad, una manifestación de condena segura.
languages.original_text: In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — a manifestation of certain doom.

traits.locale_text: A ojos de Sargona, ya no eres solo un{mf||a} enemig{mf|o|a}, sino un{mf|o|a} marcad{mf|o|a} por la disformidad, una manifestación de condena segura.

languages.text: 在萨戈纳眼中，你并不是不值一提的对手。你的灵魂被亚空间打上了烙印，你是劫难的化身。
languages.original_text: In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — a manifestation of certain doom.

traits.locale_text: 在萨戈纳眼中，你并不是不值一提的对手。你的灵魂被亚空间打上了烙印，你是劫难的化身。
在萨戈纳眼中，你并不是不值一提的对手，而是被亚空间打上烙印的强敌。亚空间也同样为他的灵魂打上了劫难的烙印。

languages.text: Vous n'êtes plus {mf|un simple ennemi|une simple ennemie} aux yeux de Sargona, vous portez désormais la marque du Warp, la preuve d'une véritable malédiction.
languages.original_text: In Sargona's eyes, you are no longer just an enemy, but one branded by the warp — a manifestation of certain doom.

traits.locale_text: Vous n'êtes plus {mf|un simple ennemi|une simple ennemie} aux yeux de Sargona, vous portez désormais la marque du Warp, la preuve d'une véritable malédiction.
